topic.title: Pre-set reporting level for minimal output

body.p: A new ReportMgr node has been introduced in Field Management that currently has a field to allow all reporting, including restarts, to be controlled according to predefined sets. A 'minimal' preset is introduced in this release, and configures the simulation output to a basic set. The purpose of this feature is to provide a simple mechanism to override existing report controls, achieve improved simulation performance, and reduce disk space use.

You can activate this feature by setting the ReportingLevel field to MINIMAL. This has the effect of turning off all 3D reporting and restart output and reduces the amount of reports written to the PRT file by using the minimum VerbosityLevel setting. Summary (line plot) reporting is not disabled but is restricted to basic field and well properties. All input specifications of the different outputs are ignored and instead the output is entirely controlled by the ReportingLevel field setting.
